item.title: We introduce DG1000 made by BMK (http://www.biomarker.com.cn/) to our lab!
item.description: We introduce DG1000 made by BMK to our lab! This little machine is capable of generating tens of thousands of single cell partitions in tens of seconds. Its special features and performance are described at BMK webpage. Its innovator and the director of experimental department come to train us in utilizing this system to capture gene expression of single cells sorted from flesh tissue.

item.title: Member 1
item.description: I am a Associate Professor in School of Basic Medical Sciences at Xi’an Jiaotong University. Prior to joining XJTU, I completed my Ph.D. in Xuerui Yang’s lab at Tsinghua University, where I studied the gene dysregulations of cancers at both transcriptional and translational levels based on high-throughput sequencing techniques. Then, I worked as a postdoctoral associate in Jason Locasale’s Lab at Duke University, studying cancer metabolism and tumor microenvironment at single cell resolution.

item.title: Member 21
item.description: I am a Assistant Professor in School of Basic Medical Sciences at Xi’an Jiaotong University. I completed my Ph.D. at Northwest A&F University, where I mainly engaged in single-cell tumor microenvironment analysis and computer-aided drug development. The main focus of my work is to understand the resistance mechanisms of immune checkpoint blockade therapy and to develop a synergistic combination strategy for tumor treatment.

Research Systematic investigation of metabolic reprogramming in different cancers based on multi-omics data Cancer is a heterogeneous disease. Characterization of such heterogeneity at different scales and resolutions is not well established. Our research strategy consists in leveraging cutting-edge sequencing techniques and bioinformatic approaches to ultimately understand various aspect of tumors. We have developped a computational pipeline to study metabolic programs in single cells (https://github.com/zhengtaoxiao/Single-Cell-Metabolic-Landscape).
